      • zoom

        public void zoom(double x,
                 double y,
                 double factor)
        Performs a zoom and center operation
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of center point
        y - y-coordinate of center point
        factor - zoom factor

      • naturalZoom

        public void naturalZoom(double x,
                        double y,
                        double factor)
        Performs a zoom based on a point but does not re-center the extent.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of center point
        y - y-coordinate of center point
        factor - zoom factor
